page.title: 13 Charminster.
page.content: } Charminster has changed quite a lot over the years. For instance houses and bungalows have been converted, mainly for older people. As you go into Charminster there are terraced houses which are compact and ideal for a family to live in, these were once army houses. Also there is a school (St. Marys) in Charminster which over the years has become more populated, because other schools have closed down, so they come to Charminster. The population of the school is now 104. By the school is a pub called The Three Compasses, and there is also The New Inn, which is also in Charminster. The population of Charminster is now 2023.
